thread.title: Lloyd Rutschman

author: Lloyd Rutschman
title: Lloyd Rutschman
text: I called needing help as I was getting phone calls because we had listed our company name in the ad we had placed. Shaun walked me through what needed to be done to change it and it was a simple fix. This is our first time using ZipRecruiter and if everyone is half as knowledgeable and genuine as Shaun was, we will definitely use you again!!
